mapper.insert: insert into workbook values (#{userId}, wbseq.nextval, #{wbJmcd}, #{wbTittle}, #{wbText}, #{wbAnswer}, sysdate,0,0)
mapper.select: select * from workbook where wbJmcd = #{value} order by wbdate desc
mapper.update: update workbook set readcnt = readcnt + 1 where wbnum = #{value}
update workbook set recocnt = recocnt+1 where wbnum = #{value}
update workbook set recocnt = recocnt-1 where wbnum = #{value}
mapper.delete: delete from boardlike where wbNum = #{wbNum} and userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from boardlike where wbNum = #{wbNum} and userId = #{userId}
